Author: IBM
name: Serverless Slack app
description: This sample shows how to build a serverless Slack app using Slack Events API to receive events, with IBM Bluemix OpenWhisk actions to process these events, and how to expose these actions with API Connect.

Author: IBM
name: Video processing with IBM OpenWhisk and Watson
description: Discover dark data in videos with IBM Watson and IBM Bluemix OpenWhisk.

Author: Jake Peyser
name: Personality Box Overview
description: Personality Box pulls the .txt files from your Box acount and allows you to analyze the unique personality traits of each file's author using the Watson Personality Insights API. For sample files, feel free to use either President Obama's 2015 State of the Union Address or Moby Dick - Chapter 1 hosted in our Box account.

Author: Jake Peyser
name: Real Time Tone Analysis Application
description: Real Time Tone Analysis samples dictation or conversations and displays a real-time transcription and an accompanying chart that plots the emotional, social, and writing tone of the language.

Author: Bluemix & Watson Team
name: ChatBot - Car Dashboard
description: Application that demonstrates how the Conversation service uses intent capabilities in an animated car dashboard UI.

Author: Ram Vennam
name: Hybrid Banking App Demo
description: Hybrid Banking Demo - Interaction of Customer on Mobile Device with Banking Service Center. Application that demos interaction between a customer and company support staff using Bluemix Mobile backend and Watson services.

Author: Ram Vennam
name: Sample Stock Trading application in Java EE
description: Build and deploy the application to Bluemix, and consume a database services and other services in the cloud.

Author: Twana Daniel
name: Deploy to Bluemix PHP codeigniter CRUD App
description: We will use PHP as the runtime and codeigniter as our framework, we will then bind the application to the database using the ClearDB MySql service on Bluemix and and deploy it to Bluemix.

Author: Bluemix & Watson Team
name: Todo Web App
description: The ToDo sample apps are meant to be simple demos of how you can take advantage of Bluemix and a database service done in number different langauges.
language: NodeJS, Java, PHP, Python, Rails, Swift

Author: ANDREW TRICE
name: Awesome skylink
description: Skylink is a sample application that lets you connect a DJI drone aircraft to the IBM Cloud with near realtime image analysis leveraging IBM Cloudant, OpenWhisk, IBM Watson, and Alchemy Vision.
